data.medicine_formulary: Discovery Chronic Medicine List and Additional Disease List
conditions_list: Cardiac failure, cardiomyopathy, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, chronic renal disease, coronary artery disease, Crohn's disease
Diabetes insipidus, diabetes type 1, diabetes type 2
additional_disease_list_conditions: Major depression, motor neuron disease, muscular dystrophy and other inherited myopathies, myasthenia gravis
Paget's disease, panic disorder, polyarteritis nodosa, post-traumatic stress disorder, psoriasis, pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
data.how_to_activate: Apply for Chronic Illness Benefit via Primary Care GP or send to Discovery Health for approval
data.coverage_details: Medicine on Discovery Chronic Medicine List for CDL. Extended medicine list for Additional Disease List. No medicine fee applies for CDL formulary medicine.
